hero.title: Empowering Morocco's Digital Future
hero.subtitle: From AI to hardware, Rkicy Technology delivers powerful, enterprise-grade IT solutions for modern businesses across Morocco and beyond.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the cornerstone of Morocco's digital future, recognized for our technical excellence, innovative solutions, and commitment to making advanced technology accessible to businesses of all sizes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower Moroccan businesses with enterprise-grade technology solutions that drive digital transformation, enhance operational efficiency, and foster sustainable growth in an increasingly connected world.

story.title: Our Story
story.lead: Founded in 2023 in Rabat, Rkicy Technology was born from a vision to bridge the technology gap for Moroccan enterprises.
story.paragraph1: Rkicy Technology was established to provide cutting-edge IT services in artificial intelligence, software development, and strategic consulting, while also serving as a trusted distributor of enterprise-grade hardware through our partnerships with global technology leaders.
story.paragraph2: Our founding team brings decades of combined experience from leading global technology firms, with deep expertise in enterprise solutions, AI implementation, and digital transformation. This unique combination of local insight and international experience allows us to deliver world-class solutions tailored to the specific needs of our Moroccan clients.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're rapidly establishing ourselves as Morocco's premier technology partner, helping organizations of all sizes navigate their digital transformation journeys with confidence and clarity.

video.placeholder: Company introduction video would play here.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We uphold the highest standards of honesty, transparency, and ethical conduct in every interaction with clients, partners, and colleagues.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We are committed to delivering exceptional quality in everything we do, from technology solutions to client service and support.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of partnership—working closely with clients as true partners to achieve transformative results together.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace continuous learning and innovative thinking, staying at the forefront of technology to deliver forward-looking solutions.

founding.title: Founding of Rkicy Technology
founding.description: Established in Rabat with a vision to transform Morocco's IT landscape through innovative solutions and services.

zebra.title: Strategic Partnership with Zebra Technologies
zebra.description: Became an official partner and distributor for Zebra Technologies hardware in Morocco.

sap.title: SAP Partnership
sap.description: Formalized partnership with SAP to deliver enterprise-grade ERP solutions to Moroccan businesses.

ai.title: Launch of AI Consulting Practice
ai.description: Expanded service offerings with dedicated AI consulting and implementation services.

government.title: Government Sector Expansion
government.description: Began serving key government agencies with specialized IT solutions and digital transformation services.

mohammed.name: Mohammed Alami
mohammed.bio: With over 15 years of experience in enterprise IT solutions, Mohammed founded Rkicy Technology with a vision to transform Morocco's technological landscape. His expertise spans AI implementation, digital transformation, and strategic partnerships with global tech leaders.

leila.name: Leila Bensouda
leila.bio: Leading our technical strategy, Leila brings 12+ years of software architecture and AI development experience. Her background includes senior roles at international tech firms and a passion for applying cutting-edge solutions to real-world business challenges.

karim.name: Karim Idrissi
karim.bio: Karim heads our consulting practice, bringing deep expertise in digital transformation and enterprise system integration. With experience serving clients across North Africa and Europe, he ensures our solutions deliver measurable business impact.

partners.title: Our Strategic Partners
partners.description: We collaborate with leading global technology providers to deliver the most advanced solutions to our clients.

cta.title: Ready to transform your business?
cta.description: Let's discuss how Rkicy Technology can help your organization thrive in the digital age.

4.description: We provide continuous monitoring, maintenance, and optimization to ensure lasting success.

paycov.subtitle: Revolutionary fintech platform for Morocco
paycov.shortDescription: A comprehensive payment solution bringing modern cashless transactions to Moroccan businesses and consumers.
paycov.title: Paycov
paycov.description: A revolutionary fintech platform bringing modern payments to Morocco and beyond

overview.title: Revolutionizing Payments in Morocco
overview.description1: Paycov is a comprehensive payment platform designed specifically for the Moroccan market, enabling true financial inclusion and digital payments for all. From peer-to-peer transfers to QR & NFC payments, chat-based transactions, and multi-card management, Paycov delivers a complete cashless experience.
overview.description2: Our solution bridges the gap between traditional banking systems and modern digital payments, making financial services accessible to everyone in Morocco—regardless of whether they have a bank account.

keyPoints.point1: First truly comprehensive payment platform built for Morocco
keyPoints.point2: Accessible to both banked and unbanked populations

founder.name: Mehdi Alaoui
founder.title: Founder & CEO
founder.quote: I founded Paycov after returning to Morocco and experiencing firsthand the challenges of digital payments here. Our mission is to make cashless transactions accessible to every Moroccan, regardless of their banking status.

featuresSection.title: Key Features
featuresSection.subtitle: Powerful features designed for the Moroccan market

p2p.title: Peer-to-peer transfers
p2p.description: Send and receive money instantly with anyone—no bank account required.

qr.title: QR & NFC payments
qr.description: Pay for taxis, groceries, shopping, and more with just your phone. No more cash—just scan a QR or tap to pay instantly and securely.

chat.title: Chat-based payments
chat.description: Request or send payments directly in your conversations—fast and intuitive.

card.title: Instant card management
card.description: Add, manage, and use multiple cards securely from any Moroccan or international bank.

security.title: Your Money, Secured
security.description: Bank-grade security and full regulatory compliance—your peace of mind comes first.

features.regulatory: Full compliance with Bank Al-Maghrib regulations

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.description: Paycov is built on a modern, scalable architecture designed for security, performance, and reliability. The system employs microservices for flexibility and uses real-time data processing to ensure instant transactions.

journey.title: The Paycov Journey
journey.subtitle: From concept to revolutionary fintech platform

nextSteps.title: What's Next for Paycov
nextSteps.description: Our roadmap for expanding Paycov's reach and capabilities

launch.title: Public Launch
launch.description: Official launch across Morocco with full feature set

expansion.title: Market Expansion
expansion.description: Expanding partnerships with merchants and service providers

international.title: International Expansion
international.description: Beginning expansion to neighboring North African countries

cta.title: Ready to experience the future of payments?
cta.description: Join thousands of Moroccans already waiting for the launch of Paycov
